metadata.description: Collection of famous long-distance visibility cases from around the world

presets.name: Mount Dankova to Hindu Tagh
presets.description: View from Mount Dankova to Hindu Tagh peak

details.notes: A remarkable line of sight between two peaks in the Kunlun Mountains

presets.name: HinduTagh to Kongur Tube
presets.description: View from HinduTagh to Kongur Tube

details.notes: Line of sight between HinduTagh and Kongur Tube

presets.name: Alto Mora to Pico La Reina
presets.description: View from Alto Mora to Pico La Reina in Colombia

details.notes: One of two remarkable sightings from Alto Mora to the Sierra Nevada peaks

presets.name: Alto Mora to Pico Cristobal Colon
presets.description: View from Alto Mora to Pico Cristobal Colon in Colombia

details.notes: Second of two remarkable sightings from Alto Mora to the Sierra Nevada peaks

presets.name: Kongur Tagh to Hindu Kush Peak
presets.description: View from Kongur Tagh to an unnamed peak in the Hindu Kush

details.notes: Notable sighting from one of the highest peaks in the Hindu Kush range
details.imageURL_1_source: Kongur Tagh to Hindu Kush Peak

presets.name: Cerro Paramillo to Pico La Reina
presets.description: View from Cerro Paramillo to Pico La Reina in Colombia

details.notes: First of two remarkable sightings from Cerro Paramillo to the Sierra Nevada peaks

presets.description: View from Cerro Paramillo to Pico Cristobal Colon in Colombia

presets.name: Kanchenjunga to Parasnath
presets.description: View from Kanchenjunga to Parasnath in India

details.notes: Notable sighting from Kanchenjunga, which also appears in another preset as viewed from Mount Everest

presets.name: K2 to Broad Peak
presets.description: View from K2 to Broad Peak

details.notes: Line of sight between the world's second-highest peak and Broad Peak

presets.name: Mount Everest to Parasnath
presets.description: View from Mount Everest to Parasnath in India

details.notes: Notable sighting from Mount Everest, which also appears in another preset viewing Kanchenjunga

presets.name: Pic de Finstrelles to Pic Gaspard
presets.description: View from Pic de Finstrelles, Spain to Pic Gaspard, France (best visibility at sunrise with very high refraction)

details.notes: Exceptional cross-country view between Spain and France, demonstrating extreme refraction effects
details.bestViewingConditions: Sunrise conditions with very high refraction

presets.name: Fort Niagara State Park to Toronto
presets.description: View from Fort Niagra State Park, NY to the CN Tower in Toronto

details.notes: Cross-lake view from New York State to Toronto's iconic CN Tower, demonstrating visibility across Lake Ontario
details.bestViewingConditions: Clear weather with high refraction (1.20) for optimal visibility
